name: Air Splitter
description:
It's all about speed!



Air splitter is a single player racing game where you don't steer your vehicle, it's all about managing your speed!
Your vehicle will automatically try to follow the track, but the faster you go, the less that will work. Only the most intrepid drivers will win, but be careful or you'll end up spinning off the road!

Race through a Breathtaking Environment!



In a retro-futuristic universe inspired by the 50s, pilot your unparalleled vehicle on holographic tracks and admire the breathtaking views of Cloud City!




  • A student game with ambitious controls!
  • A first track and vehicle to play with
  • Qualifiers and time trial modes available to challenge yourself!
  • ...It's free! So what are you waiting for to race a few laps?
